parameters.query:
WITH inserted_user AS (
  INSERT INTO users (username, pin_hash)
  VALUES ('{{$json.username_sql}}', crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', gen_salt('bf')))
  ON CONFLICT (username) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id
), actor AS (
  SELECT id FROM inserted_user
  UNION
  SELECT id FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), new_board AS (
  INSERT INTO boards (board_code, name, created_by)
  SELECT '{{$json.board_code_sql}}', COALESCE(NULLIF('{{$json.board_name_sql}}', ''), 'Shared List'), id
  FROM actor
  RETURNING id, board_code, name
), owner AS (
  INSERT INTO board_members (board_id, user_id, role)
  SELECT b.id, a.id, 'owner'
  FROM new_board b
  CROSS JOIN actor a
  ON CONFLICT (board_id, user_id) DO NOTHING
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM new_board)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Board created.',
    'board', (SELECT row_to_json(b) FROM new_board b),
    'items', '[]'::json
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Could not create board. Username/PIN may be invalid.')
END AS response;

WITH actor AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), board_row AS (
  SELECT id, board_code, name
  FROM boards
  WHERE board_code = '{{$json.board_code_sql}}'
  LIMIT 1
), joined AS (
  INSERT INTO board_members (board_id, user_id, role)
  SELECT b.id, a.id, 'member'
  FROM board_row b
  CROSS JOIN actor a
  ON CONFLICT (board_id, user_id) DO NOTHING
), items_data AS (
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.item_name,
    i.target_price,
    i.market_price,
    i.savings_daily,
    i.savings_weekly,
    i.start_date,
    i.end_date,
    i.alternatives,
    i.analysis_summary,
    i.analysis_recommendation,
    u.username AS added_by,
    i.created_at
  FROM items i
  JOIN board_row br ON br.id = i.board_id
  JOIN users u ON u.id = i.added_by
  ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM actor) AND EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM board_row)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Joined board.',
    'board', (SELECT row_to_json(b) FROM board_row b),
    'items', COALESCE((SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(i)) FROM items_data i), '[]'::json)
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Invalid username/PIN or board code.')
END AS response;

WITH actor AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), board_row AS (
  SELECT b.id, b.board_code, b.name
  FROM boards b
  JOIN board_members bm ON bm.board_id = b.id
  JOIN actor a ON a.id = bm.user_id
  WHERE b.board_code = '{{$json.board_code_sql}}'
  LIMIT 1
), inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO items (
    board_id, item_name, target_price, start_date, end_date,
    alternatives, added_by
  )
  SELECT
    br.id,
    '{{$json.item_name_sql}}',
    {{$json.target_price}},
    NULLIF('{{$json.start_date}}', '')::date,
    NULLIF('{{$json.end_date}}', '')::date,
    '[]'::jsonb,
    a.id
  FROM board_row br
  CROSS JOIN actor a
  RETURNING id
), items_data AS (
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.item_name,
    i.target_price,
    i.market_price,
    i.savings_daily,
    i.savings_weekly,
    i.start_date,
    i.end_date,
    i.alternatives,
    i.analysis_summary,
    i.analysis_recommendation,
    u.username AS added_by,
    i.created_at
  FROM items i
  JOIN board_row br ON br.id = i.board_id
  JOIN users u ON u.id = i.added_by
  ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM inserted)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Item added. Run analysis for recommendations.',
    'board', (SELECT row_to_json(b) FROM board_row b),
    'items', COALESCE((SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(i)) FROM items_data i), '[]'::json)
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Could not add item.')
END AS response;

WITH actor AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), board_row AS (
  SELECT b.id, b.board_code, b.name
  FROM boards b
  JOIN board_members bm ON bm.board_id = b.id
  JOIN actor a ON a.id = bm.user_id
  WHERE b.board_code = '{{$json.board_code_sql}}'
  LIMIT 1
), items_data AS (
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.item_name,
    i.target_price,
    i.market_price,
    i.savings_daily,
    i.savings_weekly,
    i.start_date,
    i.end_date,
    i.alternatives,
    i.analysis_summary,
    i.analysis_recommendation,
    u.username AS added_by,
    i.created_at
  FROM items i
  JOIN board_row br ON br.id = i.board_id
  JOIN users u ON u.id = i.added_by
  ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM board_row)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Board refreshed.',
    'board', (SELECT row_to_json(b) FROM board_row b),
    'items', COALESCE((SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(i)) FROM items_data i), '[]'::json)
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Invalid credentials.')
END AS response;

WITH inserted AS (
  INSERT INTO users (username, pin_hash)
  VALUES ('{{$json.username_sql}}', crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', gen_salt('bf')))
  ON CONFLICT (username) DO NOTHING
  RETURNING id
), matched AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), actor AS (
  SELECT id FROM inserted
  UNION
  SELECT id FROM matched
  LIMIT 1
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM actor)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Login successful.',
    'user', json_build_object(
      'id', (SELECT id FROM actor LIMIT 1),
      'username', '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    )
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Invalid PIN for this username.')
END AS response;

WITH actor AS (
  SELECT id
  FROM users
  WHERE username = '{{$json.username_sql}}'
    AND pin_hash = crypt('{{$json.pin_sql}}', pin_hash)
  LIMIT 1
), board_row AS (
  SELECT b.id, b.board_code, b.name
  FROM boards b
  JOIN board_members bm ON bm.board_id = b.id
  JOIN actor a ON a.id = bm.user_id
  WHERE b.board_code = '{{$json.board_code_sql}}'
  LIMIT 1
), updated AS (
  UPDATE items i
  SET
    market_price = {{$json.market_price}},
    savings_daily = {{$json.savings_daily}},
    savings_weekly = {{$json.savings_weekly}},
    alternatives = '{{$json.alternatives_sql}}'::jsonb,
    analysis_summary = NULLIF('{{$json.analysis_summary_sql}}', ''),
    analysis_recommendation = NULLIF('{{$json.analysis_recommendation_sql}}', '')
  FROM board_row br
  WHERE i.id = {{$json.item_id}}
    AND i.board_id = br.id
  RETURNING i.id
), items_data AS (
  SELECT
    i.id,
    i.item_name,
    i.target_price,
    i.market_price,
    i.savings_daily,
    i.savings_weekly,
    i.start_date,
    i.end_date,
    i.alternatives,
    i.analysis_summary,
    i.analysis_recommendation,
    u.username AS added_by,
    i.created_at
  FROM items i
  JOIN board_row br ON br.id = i.board_id
  JOIN users u ON u.id = i.added_by
  ORDER BY i.created_at DESC
)
SELECT CASE
  WHEN EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM updated)
  THEN json_build_object(
    'ok', true,
    'message', 'Item analysis updated.',
    'board', (SELECT row_to_json(b) FROM board_row b),
    'items', COALESCE((SELECT json_agg(row_to_json(i)) FROM items_data i), '[]'::json)
  )
  ELSE json_build_object('ok', false, 'error', 'Could not update item analysis.')
END AS response;
